data.title: hahahah first of all this place hasnt been open for some time!!!!
data.text: this used to be the Radisson then they lost that name and it was un named now its ACTUALLY has gotten a management co. and is going under "rodeway" hotel there is no restaurant let alone this venture......in 6 months when things get repaired and renovated they will again change their name to CLARION hotel A.U.(akron university-dumb idea)  so anyhow with that in mind....prolly not the kind of place you would like to be caught dead in!!! just sayin'
